description: Returns the SchemaMapping of a given name.

parameters.name: schemaName
parameters.description: The name of the schema to be retrieved.

nested_items.name: schemaArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) that Entity Resolution generated for the SchemaMapping.

nested_items.name: mappedInputFields
nested_items.description: A list of MappedInputFields. Each MappedInputField corresponds to a column the source data table, and contains column name plus additional information Venice uses for matching.

nested_items.name: fieldName
nested_items.description: A string containing the field name.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the attribute, selected from a list of values.

nested_items.name: groupName
nested_items.description: A string that instructs Entity Resolution to combine several columns into a unified column with the identical attribute type.

nested_items.name: matchKey
nested_items.description: A key that allows grouping of multiple input attributes into a unified matching group.

nested_items.name: subType
nested_items.description: The subtype of the attribute, selected from a list of values.

nested_items.name: hashed
nested_items.description: Indicates if the column values are hashed in the schema input.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the SchemaMapping was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the SchemaMapping was last updated.

nested_items.name: hasWorkflows
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the schema mapping has been applied to a workflow.
